job_description:
Who we are:
NOVONIX is a leading battery technology company revolutionizing the global lithium-ion battery industry with innovative, sustainable technologies, high-performance materials, and more efficient production methods. We manufacture industry-leading battery cell testing equipment in Canada and we’re growing our high-performance synthetic graphite anode material manufacturing operations in the United States. Through advanced R&D capabilities, proprietary technology, and strategic partnerships, NOVONIX has gained a prominent position in the electric vehicle and energy storage systems battery industry and is powering a cleaner energy future.

What we offer:
Competitive salary, benefits, and paid time off
Smart, collaborative team members
A chance to reduce the carbon footprint and work toward a cleaner energy future


Role summary:
This person will report directly to the Senior Manager of Data Solutions and be a part of the senior development team working on proprietary software for visualization of battery data. In the role of Senior Software Developer, you will be joining a world-class Data Solutions Team to design, develop, and deliver custom software products to industry.


Responsibilities include:
Senior developer for all web-based software within the Data Solutions Team
Primary resource for back-end maintenance
Work collaboratively as a part of an agile team to create, manage, and maintain the enterprise data platform
Design and code implementation of all new feature requests
Test new user interfaces to ensure quality and intuitiveness
Diagnose bugs on internal and external software
Design and run debugging test to diagnose and fix existing and new issues
ITIL Incident Management using JIRA software
Other duties as assigned

Qualifications:
A bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or related field and/or applicable job experience
At least 5+ years of experience in software development
Advanced knowledge and understanding of multiple programming languages such as C, C#, Typescript, Python, SQL
Knowledge in infrastructure development (Jenkins, Git, BitBucket, Jira, MS Teams)
Experience in designing and implementation of scalable, secure cloud architecture
Advanced understanding of test design and implementation
Knowledge of relational database systems, Object Oriented Programming, and web application development
Excellent problem-solving and interpersonal skills, including tact, diplomacy, and the ability to establish rapport
A highly motivated self-starter who takes initiative
Resourceful when it comes to solving problems
Intellectually curious
A critical thinker able to manage complex information
Able to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously
Comfortable with ambiguity and changing environments
A skilled communicator and storyteller
Creative
Collaborative


Extra awesome if you also have:
Experience working with AWS or other cloud environments
UI/UX experience
Machine learning or advanced time series analysis


One dream. One team. One NOVONIX.


Learn more:
Check us out at www.novonixgroup.com


Diversity statement:
